com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class DynamicThemeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<DynamicAppTheme>
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.DynamicThemeFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

    public class DynamicThemeFragment
extends ThemeFragment<DynamicAppTheme>
    Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

    Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the need.

      • onSetActionIcon

        public void onSetActionIcon(boolean enable)
        Description copied from class: ThemeFragment
        This method will be called on setting the action icon.

        It can be used to change the action icon while sharing the theme.

        Specified by:
        onSetActionIcon in class ThemeFragment<DynamicAppTheme>
        Parameters:

        Description copied from class: DynamicFragment
        Get boolean to control the shared preferences listener.
        Overrides:
        setSharedPreferenceChangeListener in class DynamicFragment
        Returns:
        true to set a shared preferences listener.

        The default values is false.
